00033 class SimpleResidueTermination
00034 {
00035  public:
00044   SimpleResidueTermination(const double minResidue = 1e-10,
00045                            const size_t maxIterations = 10000)
00046       : minResidue(minResidue), maxIterations(maxIterations) { }
00047 
00053   template<typename MatType>
00054   void Initialize(const MatType& V)
00055   {
00056     // Initialize the things we keep track of.
00057     residue = DBL_MAX;
00058     iteration = 1;
00059     nm = V.n_rows * V.n_cols;
00060     // Remove history.
00061     normOld = 0;
00062   }
00063 
00070   bool IsConverged(arma::mat& W, arma::mat& H)
00071   {
00072     // Calculate the norm and compute the residue
00073     const double norm = arma::norm(W * H, "fro");
00074     residue = fabs(normOld - norm) / normOld;
00075 
00076     // Store the norm.
00077     normOld = norm;
00078 
00079     // Increment iteration count
00080     iteration++;
00081 
00082     // Check if termination criterion is met.
00083     return (residue < minResidue || iteration > maxIterations);
00084   }
00085 
00087   const double& Index() const { return residue; }
00088 
00090   const size_t& Iteration() const { return iteration; }
00091 
00093   const size_t& MaxIterations() const { return maxIterations; }
00094   size_t& MaxIterations() { return maxIterations; }
00095 
00097   const double& MinResidue() const { return minResidue; }
00098   double& MinResidue() { return minResidue; }
00099 
00100 public:
00102   double minResidue;
00104   size_t maxIterations;
00105 
00107   double residue;
00109   size_t iteration;
00111   double normOld;
00112 
00113   size_t nm;
00114 }; // class SimpleResidueTermination
